name: 2XU Recovery Compression Socks - Unisex
description: Recover quicker after intense activity. Graduated compression helps increase bloodflow to and from your lower leg and feet, relieving tired and sore muscles. Padding underfoot keep feet comfortable and an antibacterial treatment keeps them smelling fresh.Nylon and elastane blend supports the shin, calf, ankle, Achilles and arch of the foot.High filament yarns wick sweat from the skin and a Polygiene® antibacterial finish reduces odours.Padded zones at heel and ball of foot adds comfort.Seamless construction reduces chafing.Circular knit allows 360 degree stretch.25-30mmHg graduated compression helps fend off fatigue.Hand or machine wash in cold water on the delicate cycle. Use a mild detergent. Do not bleach, iron, or tumble dry. Do not dry in direct sunlight.
